title: Implement Content Moderation Service
description: Create a content moderation service that filters prohibited content and detects spam patterns.
instructions:
Implement a ContentModerator class that:

1. Checks content against a list of banned words
2. Detects spam patterns (excessive caps, repeated characters, URLs)
3. Returns a moderation result with reasons
4. Supports configurable sensitivity levels
5. Handles edge cases (Unicode, leetspeak)

The service should be fast enough for real-time moderation during post/comment creation.

hints.text: Start by normalizing the content - convert to lowercase and handle leetspeak substitutions
Use regex patterns to detect spam indicators like repeated characters (.) repeated 4+ times
Calculate a spam score by adding weighted values for each violation, then compare against thresholds

commonMistakes.mistake: Only checking exact word matches for banned words
commonMistakes.consequence: Users can evade by adding characters or using leetspeak
commonMistakes.correction: Normalize content and check for substrings, but be careful of false positives

commonMistakes.mistake: Blocking content synchronously in a slow moderation check
commonMistakes.correction: Keep real-time checks fast; queue heavy analysis for async processing
